data.eml:eml: A new genus and a new species of Schizomyiina (Diptera: Cecidomyiidae: Asphondyliini) inducing petiole galls on Macaranga bancana (Miq.) in Borneo, Malaysia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Elsayed, Ayman Khamis, Shimizu-Kaya, Usun, Itioka, Takao, Meleng, Paulus, Yukawa, Junichi, Tokuda, Makoto (2018): A new genus and a new species of Schizomyiina (Diptera: Cecidomyiidae: Asphondyliini) inducing petiole galls on Macaranga bancana (Miq.) in Borneo, Malaysia. Zootaxa 4482 (1): 188-196, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4482.1.10
